title: Colombia
subtitle: Trek to the ancient Lost City
short_description: Trek to the mysterious, jungle-shrouded ruins of the Lost City, nestled in Colombia's rugged Sierra Nevada mountains. Experience lively Bogot√°, Caribbean-side Santa Marta, and the indigenous village of Mutanshi. This adventure includes accommodations, most meals, guides, porters, domestic flights, ground transport & 10% local community investment.
